name: interleave
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put layers or flat pieces of something between layers or flat pieces of something else: They interleaved the pages with absorbent paper to dry them out.
to combine different things so that parts of one thing are put between parts of another thing: The film interleaves extracts from her father's autobiography with family interviews.
